Author: eyjafjallafuckyall
Text: As a former starbucks barista, I’d say yeah, most likely. I mean, there’s always room for human error, but if you’re concerned, you can always customize the drink. For example, if I were to get a latte, I’d get either a skinny cinnamon dolce latte or a skinny vanilla latte (0 calorie syrups!) with almond milk, to decrease the amount of calories in my drink. Or if you want to get something seasonal, ask for two less shots of the flavor instead of the default (3 for tall, 4 for grande, 5 for venti).
